answers.answer: with all of my pregnancies I was told my placenta was weak and I didn't have enough amniotic fluid all of my babies were born on their due dates without any complicationsPlacentas do age so that sounds funny to me
Really ? Good ! That makes me feel a little better! My Dr told me I can't go past 39 wks due to my diabetes I was really hoping I wouldn't have to have him 3ven earlier then that

question: I went to the Dr today and had an ultra sound done . He told me my placenta is ageing and hel have to watch it which I already get ultra sounds from now until I deliver do to gestational diabetes. I am currently 32 wks . My question is has any one been told this and carried full term or did u deliver early ?
title: ageing placenta?
